div.div:
Kans - January 18, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.8.9
Love at first sight
Came across this on the android forums and installed it right away.... and just fell in love with it, amazing graphics, nice battery indicator on the left.... If you are a techie and love circuit boards, you would definitely love this theme. Works perfect on my Google Nexus ICS 4.0.2

bartul - June 15, 2012 - Galaxy S Plus with version 1.8.9
The one I use the longest
Paired with Minimalistic text widget maker makes it even greater because you can make invisible widgets and start apps by clicking on different transistors, diodes,chips... The only issue I have is the behaviour of the battery indicator; can't grasp it's logic-sometimes it's flashing, sometimes steady, the colours are not consistent with the battery level...

LORD RUPERT - March 21, 2012 - HTC Desire S with version 1.8.9
HTC DESIRE S ANDROID 2.3.5 SENSE 3.0
GREAT WALLPAPER! PEOPLE THINK IT'S A GENUINE VIEW OF THE INSIDE OF MY PHONE LOL AND 58KB AFTER MOVE TO SD CARD

Stacy - March 13, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.8.9
Nice
I like everything except the company's logos are not realistically there.

Jarod - May 30, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.8.9

If you're a geek, this one's for you!

use to work

...
